text: At least two ships of the Peruvian Navy have been named BAP Castilla: * , was a launched in 1943 as USS Banquest she was transferred to Peru in 1951 serving until being scrapped in 1979 * , was a launched in 1956 as HNLMS Utrecht she was transferred to Peru in 1980 serving until being decommissioned in 1990 Category:Peruvian Navy ship names
title: BAP Castilla
